Creates a new customer webhook.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"X-8x8-Tenant","in":"header","required":false,"description":"Tenant ID, it is going to be mandatory if customer has more than one CC tenant in his organisation.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"string"},"example":"TheTenant"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["name","notificationVersion","uri"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","format":"string","maxLength":256},"uri":{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"The client URI used to send system events and messages."}}},{"type":"object","properties":{"version":{"type":"string","enum":["Chat Gateway v1.0"],"description":"Event API version.","default":"Chat Gateway v1.0","title":"EventVersion"}},"title":"EventVersionIdentifierField"}],"title":"WebHookV2CreateRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
